name: Salient
headline: AI Servicing for Auto Lenders
description: Salient is an AI workflow automation tool for lenders. We're working with the largest auto lenders in America and are hiring!
tags: industry:fintech; industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:operations; industry:ai; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Ari Malik, Founder
founders.description: Sales finance @ Tesla. ex VC @ DST Global. Prior exp. at Temasek and Goldman Sachs. Computer Science + Philosophy @ Columbia.

founders.name: Mukund Tibrewala, Founder
founders.description:
Founder/CTO at Salient. ex- SWE @Airtable @Dropbox. CS + Robotics @Carnegie Mellon, where I built a real-life Harry Potter Wizard's Chess set. 

When I'm not in front of my MacBook, I climb mountains and rock faces, bike around the Bay Area, and read way too much Kerouac.

# Salient is an AI loan servicing platform built specifically for automotive finance
Meet the operating system for modern loan servicing. Streamline loan onboarding, collections, compliance and more.
[Get In TouchGet In Touch](https://www.trysalient.com/<./contact>)

### Tailored to the automotive lending industry
Salient currently offers three products, built specifically for the automotive finance industry
Agents
Compliance
Workflow
##### AI Agents to interact with consumers
Our AI agents can interact through voice, text, email, and web chat to collect payments, process due date changes and extensions, manage payoffs, and update insurance information, all in real time.
[Learn moreLearn more](https://www.trysalient.com/<./contact>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qjbGDkcaGL2OzdSIiVakrTvqc.png)

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qjbGDkcaGL2OzdSIiVakrTvqc.png)
### Made for modern automotive lenders
Salient is shaped by the practices and principles that distinguish world-class automotive lenders from the rest; relentless focus on streamlining operations, surfacing high quality data at all points, and a commitment to optimizing consumer experience.
###### Compliant, Effective, AI Agents
Deploy AI Agents to handle payments, due date changes, extensions, funding verification, insurance claims and customer queries—cutting handle time by 70%.
###### Compliant, Effective, AI Agents
Deploy AI Agents to handle payments, due date changes, extensions, funding verification, insurance claims and customer queries—cutting handle time by 70%.
###### Detect Compliance Violations in Real TIme
Ensure every interaction, whether through AI or humans, is compliant with key lending regulations, including FDCPA, FCRA, UDAAP, and CFPB guidelines
###### Detect Compliance Violations in Real TIme
Ensure every interaction, whether through AI or humans, is compliant with key lending regulations, including FDCPA, FCRA, UDAAP, and CFPB guidelines
###### Maximize Connections

###### Maximize Connections

###### Built for Enterprise
Deploy generative AI at scale, safely. Complete model observability, data privacy and security. Salient is SOC 2 and PCI L1 compliant.
###### Built for Enterprise

###### Minimize Wrap Times

###### 0-Day Integration

Salient integrates with your existing contact center, payment processor, and LMS systems

Loan Management Systems

### FAQs
Some questions we get asked the most
What makes Salient different from other voice agent providers?
Salient's AI agents are purpose-built for financial services, with compliance at their core:
  * Fully trained on CFPB, FCRA, TILA, and UDAP regulations before they handle a single call
  * Real-time monitoring ensures every interaction follows strict financial services protocols
  * Built-in safeguards prevent unauthorized disclosures and maintain data privacy
  * Consistent documentation for regulatory audits
  * Zero tolerance for deceptive practices or misleading statements


While other AI solutions retrofit compliance as an afterthought, Salient's agents are built from the ground up to protect your institution and your customers. The result? Compliant, efficient customer service that reduces risk while increasing satisfaction.
What languages do you support?
We can engage in English, Spanish, Portuguese, and Vietnamese.
Are your compliance guidelines constantly updated?
Yes, our AI contact center and compliance agents are updated every month, incorporating new rules and regulations.
How secure is my data in Salient?
Each lender receives their own private cloud, so there is no potential for data leakage. Salient is also SOC 2 and PCI L1 compliant, with regular penetration testing.
Can I integrate Salient with other lending tools and services?
Yes, Salient integrates seamlessly with popular payment processors, loan management systems, and contact centers. We're adding new integrations everyday. 
What kind of support does Salient offer?
With industry-leading SLAs, each customer will receive a dedicated customer success manager to ensure they are receiving optimal results. 
What makes Salient different from other voice agent providers?
Salient's AI agents are purpose-built for financial services, with compliance at their core:
  * Fully trained on CFPB, FCRA, TILA, and UDAP regulations before they handle a single call
  * Real-time monitoring ensures every interaction follows strict financial services protocols
  * Built-in safeguards prevent unauthorized disclosures and maintain data privacy
  * Consistent documentation for regulatory audits
  * Zero tolerance for deceptive practices or misleading statements


While other AI solutions retrofit compliance as an afterthought, Salient's agents are built from the ground up to protect your institution and your customers. The result? Compliant, efficient customer service that reduces risk while increasing satisfaction.
What languages do you support?
We can engage in English, Spanish, Portuguese, and Vietnamese.
Are your compliance guidelines constantly updated?

Each lender receives their own private cloud, so there is no potential for data leakage. Salient is also SOC 2 and PCI L1 compliant, with regular penetration testing.
Can I integrate Salient with other lending tools and services?
Yes, Salient integrates seamlessly with popular payment processors, loan management systems, and contact centers. We're adding new integrations everyday.

generated_description:
**Salient: Revolutionizing Auto Lending with AI**

Founded in 2023 and based in Los Angeles, Salient is an innovative player in fintech, positioned at the intersection of artificial intelligence and auto lending. As part of Y Combinator’s W23 batch, Salient offers a comprehensive AI workflow automation tool tailored specifically for auto lenders. This company stands out by delivering a seamless loan servicing experience for some of the largest auto lenders in America.

### Mission and Offerings
Salient's mission is clear: harness the power of AI to enhance servicing for auto lenders. Unlike traditional systems, Salient’s platform streamlines critical processes like loan onboarding, collections, and compliance through advanced automation. 

Their AI technology boasts capabilities such as:
- **AI Agents:** These agents can communicate with customers via voice, text, email, and chat to handle payments, due date adjustments, insurance updates, and more—all in real time. This functionality not only improves customer experience but also significantly reduces operational time, with handle times decreasing by up to 70%.
- **Compliance Monitoring:** Salient ensures all interactions adhere to key lending regulations (FDCPA, FCRA, UDAAP, and CFPB) through real-time compliance checks, thereby safeguarding lenders against potential violations and risks.
- **Integration Flexibility:** The platform can easily integrate with existing auto lending stacks, payment processors, and loan management systems, facilitating a smooth and swift transition for clients.

### Impact and Achievements
Since its inception, Salient has made remarkable strides:
- **Engaged Over 39 Million Consumers:** With a focus on tailored customer interactions, Salient has managed millions of unique consumer touches.
- **$561 Million Processed:** The platform has handled significant funding amounts, underscoring its robust capability.

With a compact team of 9 dedicated employees, including Group Partner Diana Hu, Salient is on an upward trajectory. Their commitment to enhancing operations, delivering high-quality data, and improving customer experiences resonates with fintech's best practices.

### Looking Ahead
For auto lenders looking to modernize and streamline their servicing operations, Salient is not just a tool—it's an essential partner. As they continue to expand and refine their services, they embody a vision of what's possible when technology and finance converge effectively.

Salient invites companies interested in transforming their auto lending operations to reach out through their website: [trysalient.com](https://www.trysalient.com). With a strong foundation, clear mission, and scalable solutions, they are paving the way for the future of AI-powered auto lending.
